instructions:
Call Summarization 1

For this test, you will need to listen to information that is provided to you through the computer. We recommend using a headset or a set of quality speakers. You will then be asked a series of questions about each of the calls.

You should enter the information that the caller gives in the appropriate boxes on the computer screen. For example, you should enter the caller's first name, last name, street address, city, and/or telephone number in the boxes marked for that information. You should enter any vehicle identification number, License Plate, or Driver's License provided by the caller in the boxes marked for that information.

You may write notes about the calls in the box in the lower half of the screen labeled Notes to help you recall information about the call.

The information you record in any of the boxes on the screen will later be available to assist you in choosing the correct answer.

After each call is completed, follow the on-screen instructions to proceed to the questions about that call.

HOW TO RESPOND TO MULTIPLE-CHOICE QUESTION

With each question there will be four choices labeled A, B, C, and D. You can choose your response in one of three ways.

  1. You can use your mouse to select your answers
  2. You can use the up and down arrows to choose your response.
  3. You can hold down the Alt key and then press either A, B, C, or D.

mcqQuestions.questionText: Which of the following best describes this call?

options.text: John's threatening to run away got him permission for another ice cream sandwich.
John ran away.
John's mother is a push-over.
John's mother has trouble dealing with her hyperactive son.

emergencyQuestions.questionText: Homeowner with arm stuck in kitchen drainpipe.

mcqQuestions.questionText: Which of the following best describes this call?

options.text: Ellen is showing off through bragging about her children's activities.
The two women had a brief conversation about their evening plans.
Sally is jealous of Ellen's involvement with her children.
Both women dislike their jobs so they pass the time by talking.

emergencyQuestions.questionText: Police officer cuts his hand while freeing cat from tree.

mcqQuestions.questionText: Which of the following best describes this call?

options.text: Mildred is upset about not winning at bingo very frequently and Elsie tries to cheer her.
Mildred wants to win more often so she slyly tried to get Elsie to share her winnings if she wins.
Elsie is very concerned about paying her grocery bill.
Mildred is typically the more up-tight of the two sisters while Elsie is the more easy-going.

mcqQuestions.questionText: Which of the following best describes this call?

options.text: Tracy's thorough preparation helped her feel less nervous.
Hard work always seems to pay off.
Other people's words of encouragement lessened Tracy's nervousness.
Tracy was nervous about giving a speech but it went fine.

mcqQuestions.questionText: Which of the following best describes this call?

options.text: Fred is polite and thoughtful which is why everyone in town chose that dry cleaners.
Fred was waiting for the right opportunity to ask Margaret out and he took this one.
Fred offered to take Margaret to a movie after hearing that her mother had measles.
Fred was being polite when he asked how Margaret was and expressed sympathy.

captions.CS211:
WEBVTT

1
00:00:00.150 --> 00:00:02.399
I saw my neighbor's son John

2
00:00:02.400 --> 00:00:04.230
run out of his house slamming the

3
00:00:04.231 --> 00:00:05.930
screen door behind him.

4
00:00:06.190 --> 00:00:08.390
John yelled that he was running
away.

5
00:00:08.790 --> 00:00:11.110
He stopped five steps from the back
door

6
00:00:11.220 --> 00:00:13.040
turned back toward the screen door

7
00:00:13.170 --> 00:00:15.120
and in a loud voice stated that he

8
00:00:15.121 --> 00:00:17.219
was serious and that he would never
be seen

9
00:00:17.220 --> 00:00:17.900
again.

10
00:00:18.540 --> 00:00:20.660
John's mother appeared at the screen
door

11
00:00:20.730 --> 00:00:22.979
and gave into John's demands for
another

12
00:00:22.980 --> 00:00:24.120
ice cream sandwich.
captions.CS212:
WEBVTT

1
00:00:00.150 --> 00:00:02.040
Ellen and Sally worked together on
an

2
00:00:02.041 --> 00:00:04.100
inspection line at the candy
factory.

3
00:00:04.500 --> 00:00:06.630
Sally said she would love to go to
the McDonald's

4
00:00:06.631 --> 00:00:09.020
after work with Ellen if Ellen was
available.

5
00:00:09.600 --> 00:00:11.550
Ellen responded that she had to take
Jamie

6
00:00:11.551 --> 00:00:13.970
to a piano lesson at 515

7
00:00:14.070 --> 00:00:16.230
and give Amy and her friends from a
soccer

8
00:00:16.231 --> 00:00:16.910
practice

9
00:00:17.280 --> 00:00:19.110
but suggested that maybe tomorrow
they could

10
00:00:19.111 --> 00:00:20.050
go to McDonalds.

11
00:00:20.310 --> 00:00:21.449
Sally agreed to that

12
00:00:21.450 --> 00:00:23.370
and told Ellen that she would fix
her leaky

13
00:00:23.371 --> 00:00:24.950
faucet this evening instead.

14
00:00:25.380 --> 00:00:27.270
Both women turn their focus back to
the

15
00:00:27.271 --> 00:00:28.550

captions.CS213:
WEBVTT

1
00:00:00.210 --> 00:00:02.069
My friend Mildred plays bingo

2
00:00:02.070 --> 00:00:04.790
at her local church every Saturday
afternoon.

3
00:00:05.190 --> 00:00:06.179
On her way to bingo,

4
00:00:06.180 --> 00:00:08.090
She picks up her sister Elsie.

5
00:00:08.490 --> 00:00:10.520
Both thoroughly enjoy the game

6
00:00:10.650 --> 00:00:12.660
even though neither one considers
herself

7
00:00:12.661 --> 00:00:13.790
to be too lucky.

8
00:00:14.430 --> 00:00:16.679
Last Sunday Mildred complained

9
00:00:16.680 --> 00:00:18.500
about how she rarely wins.

10
00:00:19.080 --> 00:00:21.210
Elsie urged her to relax reminding

11
00:00:21.211 --> 00:00:23.300
her that it's not winning that's
important.

12
00:00:23.460 --> 00:00:25.040
It's how you play the game.

13
00:00:25.530 --> 00:00:27.390
Mildred mumbled that how you play

14
00:00:27.391 --> 00:00:29.720
the game doesn't pay her grocery
bill.

15
00:00:30.330 --> 00:00:32.039
Elsie gave up unreasoning

16
00:00:32.040 --> 00:00:33.670
and just wished Mildred luck.
captions.CS214:
WEBVTT

1
00:00:00.210 --> 00:00:02.160
My sister Tracy told me she was
nervous

2
00:00:02.161 --> 00:00:04.019
because she had to give a speech in
front

3
00:00:04.020 --> 00:00:05.120
of television cameras.

4
00:00:05.580 --> 00:00:07.650
Those who sat in during her
rehearsals

5
00:00:07.651 --> 00:00:09.150
of her speech were very impressed

6
00:00:09.151 --> 00:00:10.490
with the speeches content

7
00:00:10.620 --> 00:00:12.410
and Tracy's presentation style.

8
00:00:12.870 --> 00:00:14.880
Even with many words of
encouragement from

9
00:00:14.881 --> 00:00:16.640
those who attended the rehearsals,

10
00:00:16.830 --> 00:00:18.170
Tracy was still anxious.

11
00:00:18.510 --> 00:00:20.630
When it came time for the actual
presentation,

12
00:00:20.790 --> 00:00:22.700
Tracy said she had an upset stomach.

13
00:00:22.890 --> 00:00:24.790
However she delivered the speech perfectly.
captions.CS215:
WEBVTT

1
00:00:00.150 --> 00:00:02.099
My brother Fred works part time

2
00:00:02.100 --> 00:00:04.230
at a dry cleaner where everyone
drops

3
00:00:04.231 --> 00:00:05.330
off their laundry.

4
00:00:05.940 --> 00:00:07.079
Fred greeted Margaret

5
00:00:07.080 --> 00:00:08.570
and asked how she was.

6
00:00:09.030 --> 00:00:10.950
Margaret told Fred that her mother

7
00:00:10.951 --> 00:00:12.269
came down with Measles

8
00:00:12.270 --> 00:00:14.270
and was quarantined to the house.

9
00:00:14.820 --> 00:00:16.379
She went on to say that she

10
00:00:16.380 --> 00:00:18.360
and the rest of her family were
staying

11
00:00:18.361 --> 00:00:20.970
with her grandmother so they didn't
start an epidemic.

12
00:00:21.610 --> 00:00:23.529
Fred said that he was sorry to hear
that

13
00:00:23.530 --> 00:00:25.690
and asked if his treating Margaret
to see a movie

14
00:00:25.691 --> 00:00:26.394
would cheer Margaret up.

15
00:00:27.160 --> 00:00:28.510
Margaret said yes.
